mapper.select: select * from productOption where productNo = #{productNo} and optionStat=1 order by optionProcedure asc
select * from productOption where productNo = #{productNo} order by optionProcedure asc
select * from product p, productOption po where userNo = #{userNo} and p.productNo = po.productNo order by p.productNo, optionProcedure asc

select p.productNo, count(p.productNo) as productNoCount from product p, productOption po where p.userNo = #{userNo} and p.productNo = po.productNo group by productNo order by p.productNo, optionProcedure asc
